description: Transgender rights activists including Chelsea Manning, a former U.S. army intelligence analyst and whistleblower, took to Capitol Hill on Thursday in protest of a new policy barring trans people from using single-sex facilities on the House side of the Capitol complex that match their gender identity. More than a dozen transgender individuals and their allies…
title: Trans rights activists protest Capitol bathroom ban

description: President-elect Trump's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) promises to cut government spending, and the government should give bonuses to departments that spend less than budgeted and employees who flag government waste.
title: To increase government efficiency, align government workers’ incentives

description: Bipartisan lawmakers are trying to give the president more authority to make trade deals to bolster the nation’s supply of minerals that can be used in the technology, low-carbon energy and weapons sectors.  The bill, from Sens. Todd Young (R-Ind.) and Chris Coons (D-Del.), seeks to expand the authority of the executive branch to make…
title: Bipartisan bill seeks to have president strike international mineral deals

description: Both cases involve dismissals “without prejudice,” an important legal distinction.
title: Dismissal of Trump’s criminal cases does not prevent future prosecutions in 2029

description: Speaker Mike Johnson is holding a press conference ahead of GOP lawmakers’ high-stakes meeting with Tesla CEO Elon Musk and biotech entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy, who were tapped by President-elect Trump to head the new Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE). DOGE is tasked with working outside government to “dismantle” bureaucracy, slash “excess” regulations, cut wasteful spending…
title: Watch live: Johnson gives remarks ahead of meeting with DOGE heads Musk, Ramaswamy

description: Sen. Richard Blumenthal (D-Conn.) said on Wednesday he has talked to several Republican colleagues who have said they are “waiting for the right moment” to reject Pete Hegseth as the nominee to lead the Pentagon. “I’ve talked to five to 10 Republicans who have said to me, they’re just waiting for the right moment to…
title: Senate Democrat: Multiple Republicans are ‘waiting for the right moment to say no’ to Hegseth

description: The loss of the Senate by the Democratic Party may lead to a permanent Republican Senate, limiting the enactment of broad campaign promises, entrenching the perception of dysfunction in Washington, and ensuring the conservative majority on the Supreme Court remains.
title: Republicans just won a permanent Senate majority

description: Even the brightest experts, with the most well-connected contacts, didn’t see such a decisive military maneuver coming nearly 14 years into the Syrian Civil War.
title: Where does the Syrian Civil War go from here?

description: Iowa Sen. Joni Ernst (R) told Fox News in an interview Thursday morning that she’s not ready to support Pete Hegseth’s nomination to serve as secretary of Defense and wants to thoroughly review his background and allegations of misconduct before making a decision on how to vote. “Well, I did have a very long, lengthy…
title: Ernst, key GOP vote, noncommittal on Hegseth nomination

description: Google said Wednesday that its own artificial intelligence (AI) agent outperformed the world’s best weather predictions. In a blog post, Ilan Price and Matthew Willson, researchers with Google’s DeepMind, said its recently-made “AI ensemble model” named GenCast “provides better forecasts of both day-to-day weather and extreme events than the top operational system, the European Centre…
title: Google says its AI agent outperformed the world’s best weather predictions

description: Supreme Court Justice Neil Gorsuch recused himself on Wednesday from an environment case that’s slated to come before the court next week.  Gorsuch announced his recusal in a one-paragraph letter published on the court’s website. It did not explain his reasons for doing so, though it comes after a push from Democrats alleging that he…
title: Gorsuch recuses himself from environmental case before Supreme Court

description: A search is underway in New York City for the gunman who shot and killed UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson early Wednesday morning. Thompson was shot multiple times at about 6:45 a.m. EST Wednesday outside New York Hilton Midtown, in central Manhattan, where Thompson was slated to attend an annual investors meeting. New York police commissioner…
title: Manhunt underway after fatal shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO

description: Kash Patel, President-elect Trump’s pick to lead the FBI, has threatened legal action against a former aide to ex-Vice President Pence over her comments criticizing Patel, the aide said.  Olivia Troye, a former counterterrorism aide to Pence who has become a vocal critic of Trump, on MSNBC earlier this week said Patel would “lie about…
title: Patel has threatened legal action over remarks, former Pence aide says

description: Welcome to The Hill’s annual list of top lobbyists.  The lobbyists on this list are some of the best in the business and have been go-to advocates during a year defined by unprecedented political events, legislative logjams, federal spending cut crusades and big rulemaking swings by the outgoing Biden administration. But Washington and K Street…
title: The Hill’s Top Lobbyists 2024

description: Rep. Rich McCormick (R-Ga.) said on Wednesday that he was “really impressed” with Pete Hegseth, President-elect Trump’s nominee to lead the Pentagon, after the former Fox News host met with the House Republicans on Capitol Hill. McCormick said in an interview on NewsNation’s “The Hill” that Hegseth presented his case well before the House Republican…
title: Republican rep ‘really impressed’ after meeting with Hegseth
